pr_title: Fix mssql drop index and table migrations

timeline.message: add getters and modify some setters to return a reference to itself
add constraint dropping when dropping index in case of unique
replace fetching of query strings with running of tasks

timeline.bodyText:
recommend renaming getMyProductVersion to getProductVersion here and in the method below.
There is a setting in IJ where you can tell is that the my in field names is a common prefix and it shouldn't add it to the generated method names like these... I'll show you next time we chat
timeline.author: jamesagnew
